issue.title: [Java] Add JDBC adapter test to cover cases which contains some null values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6710](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6710). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current JDBC adapter tests only cover the cases that values are all non-null or all null.

However, the cases that ResultSet has some null values are not covered (ARROW-6709).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6710?focusedCommentId=16945178) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5521
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5521>
